docs.title: T470 Edge Router Infrastructure
docs.text: Welcome to the internal documentation wiki for the homelab edge environment.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: This system serves as the primary gateway, DNS resolver, and active defense node for the network. It is built on a "trust no one" architecture.

docs.title: Core Services
docs.text:
• Hardware: Lenovo ThinkPad T470 (Utilizing battery as built-in UPS)
  • OS: Debian Linux
  • Perimeter Defense: CrowdSec IDS/IPS (nftables bouncer)
  • DNS Resolution: Unbound (Recursive caching) + AdGuard Home
  • Overlay Network: Tailscale

Documentation maintained via automated CI/CD pipeline.
